verses.verse: At the end <S%G3796><s%> of the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>, as it began to dawn <S%G2020><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> the first <S%G1520><s%> day of the week <S%G4521><s%>, came <S%G2064><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G243><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> to see <S%G2334><s%> the tomb <S%G5028><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and came <S%G4334><s%> and rolled back <S%G617><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> upon <S%G1883><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

His <S%G846><s%> appearance <S%G2397><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> lightning <S%G796><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> clothes <S%G1742><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> snow <S%G5510><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> for <S%G575><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> the keepers <S%G5083><s%> did shake <S%G4579><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> dead men <S%G3498><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to the women <S%G1135><s%>, Fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>: <S%G5210><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, which was crucified <S%G4717><s%>.

He is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> here <S%G5602><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he is risen <S%G1453><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>. Come <S%G1205><s%>, see <S%G1492><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> lay <S%G2749><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>, and tell <S%G2036><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he is risen <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, he goes before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>; there <S%G1563><s%> shall you see <S%G3700><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%>, I have told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they departed <S%G1831><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the tomb <S%G3419><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%>; and did run <S%G5143><s%> to bring <S%G518><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> word <S%G518><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they went <S%G4198><s%> to tell <S%G518><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> met <S%G528><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, All hail <S%G5463><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> they came <S%G4334><s%> and held <S%G2902><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by the feet <S%G4228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them <S%G846><s%>, Be <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%>: go <S%G5217><s%> tell <S%G518><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, and there <S%G2546><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G4198><s%> they <S%G846><s%> were going <S%G4198><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, some <S%G5100><s%> of the watch <S%G2892><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>, and showed <S%G518><s%> to the chief priests <S%G749><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the things that were done <S%G1096><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they were assembled <S%G4863><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> had taken <S%G2983><s%> counsel <S%G4824><s%>, they gave <S%G1325><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> money <S%G694><s%> to the soldiers <S%G4757><s%>,

Saying <S%G3004><s%>, Say <S%G3754><s%> His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> by night <S%G3571><s%>, and stole <S%G2813><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away while <S%G2837><s%> we <S%G2257><s%> slept <S%G2837><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> comes <S%G191><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the governor <S%G2232><s%>'s ears <S%G191><s%>, we <S%G2249><s%> will persuade <S%G3982><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> secure <S%G275><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

So <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the money <S%G694><s%>, and did <S%G4160><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they were taught <S%G1321><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> is commonly reported <S%G1310><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3101><s%> eleven <S%G1733><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went away <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had sent <S%G5021><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, they worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G3588><s%> doubted <S%G1365><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>.

Go <S%G4198><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, and teach <S%G3100><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%>, baptizing <S%G907><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>:

Teaching <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to observe <S%G5083><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> I have commanded <S%G1781><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> always <S%G2250><s%>, even to <S%G2193><s%> the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
